duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the pastry sous chef in the preparation of all baked items for the resort’s restaurants, food and beverage outlets, and banquets.
Prepare pastries on a day-to-day basis.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED equivalent, 1-year experience in high volume/fine dining/Banquet/pastry production preferably in a hotel/resort environment.
Associate’s degree in F&B and/or course certification from an accredited culinary institute is helpful.
